Evidence: Ep2 can also promote the transactivation of epidermal growth factor receptor (egfr) expressed in colon cancer cells through src, which activates the proteolytic release of the egfr ligands amphiregulin (ar) and transforming growth factor-alfa (tgfalfa).
Subject: p(HGNC:PTGER2)

Evidence: Pge2 receptors are coupled to the g protein gs, which causes accumulation of cyclic adenosine monophosphate (camp) and activates protein kinase a (pka), we confirmed that pge2 treatment or transfection of cells with the active catalytic subunit of pka also stimulated the activity of a camp-responsive-elementdriven reporter gene (cre-luc).
Subject: p(HGNC:PTGER2)

Evidence: Perfusion with PGE1 is suggested to increase flow through the trabecular meshwork by stimulation of prostanoid EP2 receptor subtype, EP4 receptor subtype, or both, coupled to G (s) protein, inducing activation of the adenylyl cyclase catalytic unit.
Subject: p(HGNC:PTGER2)
